title: What to know about the House Republicans' just-passed budget plan
shortDescription: The House advanced President Donald Trump's legislative agenda with big tax cuts. Democrats warn it might lead to cutting Medicaid.

title: 'Catastrophic': Woman loses park ranger job offer after Trump cuts
shortDescription: Kathryn Brainerd was only days away from her dream job as a U.S. park ranger before it disappeared.

title: President Trump holds first cabinet meeting at White House
shortDescription: President Trump holds his first cabinet meeting at the White House

title: Trump faces backlash for posting AI video of Gaza
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is facing backlash for posting an AI-generated video of a "Trump Gaza" resort.

title: 'Super Mayor' Tiffany Henyard loses election by landslide
shortDescription: Tiffany Henyard reminded residents of the repaved streets and sidewalks she brought to fruition, and a $3 million grant to rebuild the village.

title: Teachers union sues to block Trump's anti-DEI policy in schools
shortDescription: A prominent teachers union has sued to block a Trump administration policy that would withhold federal funds from schools with DEI programs.

title: What is a gold card? What to know about President Trump's proposal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the United States will sell "a gold card" to foreigners allowing them to live and work in America.

title: Trump desk removed for refinishing, not 'security scan' | Fact check
shortDescription: There's no evidence listening devices were discovered in the Oval Office. A similar version of the claim cites fabricated sources.

title: Tim Walz decides not to run for open US Senate in Minnesota
shortDescription: Tim Walz, the former Democratic VP nominee and governor of Minnesota, has decided he won't run for his state's open U.S. Senate seat in 2026.

title: Trump wants to sell $5 million 'gold cards' as path to citizenship
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he wants to offer wealthy immigrants "gold cards" that would give a pathway to citizenship in exchange for a $5 million purchase price.

title: Pushing the envelope: A look at USPS' history amid Trump takeover talk
shortDescription: President Trump proposed bringing the independent service under the Commerce Department purview. That would upend decades of historical independence.

title: MAGA ecstasy: Trump rides high with GOP critics out in the cold
shortDescription: Donald Trump and Elon Musk revel in disruptive wins, while traditional Republicans struggle with irrelevancy.

title: Trump, Musk lay off 1,400 more VA employees in latest federal purge
shortDescription: The workers sacked on Monday were all "bargaining-unit probationary employees" in "non-mission critical roles," according to the VA.

title: House votes 217-215 to advance budget plan
shortDescription: The House passed a GOP-backed budget plan for Donald Trump's agenda, with three Republicans making a last-minute change to support the bill.

title: Trump pitches 'gold card' path to citizenship
shortDescription: President Donald Trump introduced a replacement to the "EB-5" foreign investor program in the form of a $5 million dollar gold card.

title: House Republicans narrowly advance plan for Trump's legislative agenda
shortDescription: Four Republicans threatened to tank the vote before three switched to support in a last-minute change.

title: Trump considers $5 million 'gold card' to entice wealthy investors
shortDescription: Trump wants to replace a visa program for foreign investors with a 'gold card' that could be bought for $5 million.

title: Trump mineral deal imminent, would 'recoup' Ukraine war costs
shortDescription: A deal that would see Ukraine turn over revenue from its mineral resources to the U.S. appeared imminent after a Trump-led public pressure campaign.

title: Who is DOGE's official leader? The White House finally says.
shortDescription: The White House on Tuesday revealed Amy Gleason is the acting administrator of Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency.

title: Lawmakers discuss DOGE plans at Capitol
shortDescription: DOGE caucus members announced legislation to codify President Donald Trump's executive order to reduce the federal workforce.
